title: No Return Address: A collection of poems
description: Pluma Migrant Writers Guild in Kuwait’s first collection of epistolary poems reflects on traditional and modern correspondence, while serving as a timeline in the advancement of communications technology. No Return Address transcends the migrant’s ever shifting worldviews, taking a peek at the sheer relativity of distance and constant reconciliation with time and space. The chapbook contains poems by Nabeel Philip Mohan, GAP Gutierrez, Mujel Hasan, Alliah "Lenzkie" Tabaya, Wilfred Waters, Tammy Sulit, and Armineonila M.
author: Nabeel Philip Mohan
